title: DirectX issue

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
I am creating this as ever since patch 8.2 has been live on OCE server i have been having issues with the client telling me there is an unknown DirectX issue and it happens once in like 15 or so games. it has gotten me 2 leaver busters this week alone. I have my Drivers up to date. I don't know what to do. i am losing interest in playing knowing 100 minutes of my life waiting to just start a league queue is wasted because of a failure that isnt my fault. I have a friend who has also had this problem. In the link provided there is a photo of the error, the leaverbuster because 0f it a screenshot in client of the 3 games i played before without problems and the same in OP.GG showing the time between the games i have been playing. When this happens i cannot reconnect to the game what so ever, if i restart my client, restart my computer and even trying on my laptop instead of my desktop i still cannot reconnect. then it goes back to normal the next game and i have no issues connecting and playing. 

Is there anything i can do to try and fix this issue (don't suggest updating my drivers as they are all up to date as of 27/1/2018.). Is this a known issue and you guys are working on a fix? i dont find it fair i have to put up with low priority queue because of something thats not my fault..

replies.body:
If it's direct X issues try reinstalling Direct X:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-au/help/179113/how-to-install-the-latest-version-of-directx

_**Never** download anything Direct X related from anywhere except Microsoft themselves_
